Plot: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.
Title: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
Writer: Guillermo del Toro (screenplay), Matthew Robbins (screenplay), Nigel McKeand
Actors: Katie Holmes, Guy Pearce, Bailee Madison, Jack Thompson
tomatoConsensus: While it's pleasantly atmospheric and initially quite scary, Don't Be Afraid of the Dark ultimately fails to deliver the skin-crawling chills of the original.
